subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard and the Magic, sick of seeing replays of LeBron James’s dramatic Game 2 buzzer-beater, downed the Cavaliers to take a 2-1 lead in a series getting nastier by the minute.
snippet: Dwight Howard and the Magic, sick of seeing replays of LeBron James’s dramatic Game 2 buzzer-beater, downed the Cavaliers to take a 2-1 lead in a series getting nastier by the minute.
